headline: Altria Group, Inc. (MO): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Altria Group, Inc. on r/wallstreetbets by quinoasqueefs. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on MO. Altria Group, Inc.’s share was trading at $60.15 as of January 13th. MO’s trailing and forward P/E were 11.17 and 10.45 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Altria Group, Inc. is one of […]
